page.title: 13Trade, Murroes area
page.content:
There is not much in the way of trade in this area. There are only two shops. They also have post-offices. They sell groceries, confectionery and tobacco. They are also newsagents. Although people buy odd groceries from them they do not buy all they need there as they do not cover all their needs and tend to be more expensive.
They mostly do their shopping in supermarkets in the towns roundabout eg. Tesco, Asda, Wm. Low, Presto and Safeway.
There is a baker's van going round the area selling rolls,also a butcher's van , and a fish van.
